trans-unit.source: Email: The e-mail address associated with the API key.
API Key: This is the API key made available on your account page (https://www.cloudflare.com/a/account/my-account)
Domains: Please tick the domains whose cache should be flushed on CloudFlare upon clearing all caches in TYPO3.
Originating IPs: Tick this checkbox in case you cannot restore the originating IPs at the webserver level.
Cache content over SSL: Requires EXT:nc_staticfilecache. Tick this checkbox in case you would to cache content over SSL. Typically useful when securing your website with CloudFlare's flexible SSL.
Purge single files (experimental): Tick this checkbox to try to purge single files on CloudFlare. Beware: Highly experimental!
API Endpoint: Alternate API endpoint/proxy. Beware: DO NOT change unless you know what you do!
Empty list fetched from CloudFlare, please check your credentials.
